body:
I am trying to use `spack fetch` command for my builds to download packages on login host, but push the remaining build stages to another computer. Unfortunately on one of our clusters `fetch` freezes and after a very long time produces

```
==> Error: [Errno 5] Input/output error
```

Can't figure it out. I thought it might be a permission or disk space problem, but I tried cloning into a few different locations and the effect is the same. This must be related to something in my environment or in the setup of this login host.

I am attaching my [enviornment](https://github.com/spack/spack/files/3977644/env.txt).

There's a GPFS cluster in there, but I think on login host it is mounted via NFS.

Please advise.
title: spack fetch freezes
